channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Coinbase explains donation to Trump's ballroom
item.description: Coinbase donated to President Trump's $300 million White House ballroom project as an appeal to the administration, Emilie Choi, the cryptocurrency ex...

item.title: Exclusive: Entrepreneur Emma Grede stands by comments on successful women
item.description: Entrepreneur Emma Grede rejected the idea that women must adhere to certain expectations regarding work/life balance during a sit-down interview at Ax...

item.title: AI bubble is actually an LLM bubble, Hugging Face CEO says at Axios BFD.
item.description: Large language models (LLMs) are the real bubble that's going to burst, even though an AI bubble gets more attention, Hugging Face CEO Clem Delangue t...

item.title: Two dozens House Democrats vote with Republicans to rebuke one of their members
item.description: A group of nearly two dozen House Democrats voted with Republicans on Tuesday to pass a measure reprimanding Rep. Chuy García (D-Ill.) for effectively...

item.title: Coinbase's Choi sees more companies leaving Delaware
item.description: Coinbase president and COO Emilie Choi predicted there will be a wave of corporate relocations out of Delaware due to a fear of activist judges during...

item.title: How every House member voted to release the Epstein files
item.description: Lawmakers voted overwhelmingly to release the investigation files. See how your representative voted.

item.title: Trump administration revives some funding for IG group
item.description: The move marks a reversal of an effort to eliminate funding for the umbrella group that helps support inspectors general offices.

item.title: Since Khashoggi killing, here’s how U.S.-Saudi relations have changed
item.description: After Mohammed bin Salman’s last White House visit, U.S.-Saudi ties were strained by the slaying of Jamal Khashoggi. They’ve rebounded in Trump’s seco...

item.title: House Democrats split over unusual reprimand of one of their own
item.description: Rep. Jesús “Chuy” García timed his retirement this month to advantage his chosen successor.

item.title: House votes overwhelmingly to force release of Jeffrey Epstein files
item.description: The move sends the legislation to the Senate, where Republican leaders signaled they could move quickly on it.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
